ygData.subject: Vendui Norrathians!
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings!  I am new to this mailing list so I thought I would give a word or many of introduction.  At this point I would introduce myself as my main, but
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings! I am new to this mailing list so I thought I would give a word
or many of introduction. At this point I would introduce myself as my main,
but since I'm still undecided as to who my main actually is, I will tell you
about my characters and how this all began.

I started playing EverQuest a little over a year ago. The first character I
ever created was a half elf rogue by the name of Wulfric Rennison who is
currently level 31. Since Wulfric I have created a druid who originally
started out as a half elf until I realized druids are wisdom based casters
and half elves don't have much wisdom. So I deleted the druid at level 15
and recreated him as a wood elf. His name is Raido Covenfall. Currently he
is level 40. Wulfric and Raido are really my two mains, though Wulfric
doesn't get played much. I mainly use Raido to earn plat to buy better gear
for Wulfric. Then my two lesser characters are Celric Feldrak (an anagram
for "dark elf cleric" in case you didn't catch it) a level 20 currently
working on faction in Qeynos for the Testament of Vanear quest, and Savawulf
Tageric (a combination of two words - Savatage and Wulfric. Savatage being
my favorite band and Wulfric you already know. Wulfric incidentally is made
of two words "wolf" and "reich".). Those are all on the Cazic Thule server.
If you see one of them sometime, feel free to send a tell. Then I have
various characters on other servers, the primary ones being Kenjite Arimasen
(in Japanese means "There are no forbidden subjects"), currently a level 18
wood elf druid, and Petrus Steelsinger (so named for Peter Steele, front man
for the band Type O Negative), who, of course, is a bard half elf, currently
level 11 and rarely played.

All of these characters are in various guilds. Raido and Celric are both
tagged in the guild "Amicus Concordiam". Wulfric and Savawulf are tagged
to the guild "Draconis Rampant". Kenjite and Petrus are tagged to the guild
"Bane of Tunare".

I have many friends who play online, and I am also responsible for getting
several people addicted. I love the game, I don't plan on quitting any time
soon, and I believe that if I ever get married, my wife will have to be an
EQ addict as well! Oh yeah... and she has to like cartoons and kung fu
movies... but that's neither here nor there.

And for what it's worth... I don't really have a life outside of EQ. :b

See you online!!
Send me a tell!


Aluve Norrathians!!

Wulfric/Raido/Celric/Savawulf/Kenjite/Petrus

"Friends In Unity"
"CHAOS to All Our Foes"

(PS Hi Kwasi!) :)
